page.description: Converts a two character state abbreviation to its full state name.

argument.name: state_abbreviation
argument.description: The two character code for a US state or Canadian province.

page.discussion: CSTATE() converts a two-character string containing a State_Code to its full State_Name. Note : Canadian province codes and names can also be processed with this function.
page.example: cstate("NY") "New York" cstate(STATE) "New York", if STATE contains "NY" cstate(STATE_PROV) "Saskatchewan", if STATE_PROV contains "SK"
